summary: A comprehensive panel discussion exploring the multifaceted impact of AI on various domains, ranging from job displacement and privacy concerns to ethical considerations and India's potential as a global leader in AI.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion at a conference titled "AI & Human Developers," scheduled for Wednesday, 31 May, from 10-11:30 am PST, held at Plug and Play, 440 N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, CA 94085, US. The stage features three men seated in modern chairs, engaging in a lively conversation. The man in the center, dressed in a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and appears to be speaking, while the man on the left, wearing a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, listens attentively. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, also participates in the discussion. Behind them, a large screen displays a graphic of a human head with a network of lines and text, symbolizing the theme of artificial intelligence. The audience, visible in the foreground, watches the panel attentively, with some members taking notes. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists actively engaging with each other and the audience. The video maintains a consistent setting throughout, emphasizing the importance of the discussion on AI and its implications for human developers.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker discussing recent snooping scandals and questioning privacy and surveillance within AI development. He then lightheartedly remarks that he has given up on the privacy battle, assuming his phone is tapped and jokingly says hello to Mr. Modi. His tone is jovial, with audible laughter from the audience. He then shifts to a more serious tone, emphasizing the importance of establishing rules regarding citizen privacy, data privacy, and protection of data both as a nation and as individuals. The audience applauds. The speaker continues, mentioning AI's potential to disrupt employment patterns.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion at a conference, featuring three men seated on stage. The man in the center, dressed in a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and appears to be speaking, gesturing with his hands. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts holds a piece of paper and listens attentively, while the man on the right, wearing a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and seems to be engaged in the conversation. The background displays a large screen with a blue digital image of a human head and text that reads "AI & Human Dev..." along with event details, including the date and location. The audience, visible in the foreground, watches the discussion attentively. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists actively participating in the dialogue.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a conversation about AI and its impact on employment, with a male speaker expressing skepticism about AI leading to massive job loss, anticipating that while some jobs will be lost, many more will be created. The speaker uses a measured and reasoned tone. This speech is followed by what appears to be one word from a different speaker, sounding like a question.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, each in a modern, gray armchair. The man in the center, dressed in a white polo shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and appears to be speaking, gesturing with his hands to emphasize his points. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts holds a piece of paper, possibly notes or questions, and listens attentively. On the right, a man in a light blue button-up shirt and dark pants also listens, occasionally adjusting his posture and touching his face. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up image of a man with a beard, suggesting the topic of discussion may be related to this individual. The background features a blue, abstract design, adding a modern touch to the setting. The audience is partially visible in the foreground, indicating an engaged and attentive crowd. Throughout the video, the men maintain their positions, with the central speaker continuing to address the audience, while the others remain attentive and occasionally respond or react to the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker discussing a historical perspective on technological advancements. He references the steam engine, petrol engine, and computers, noting how they were initially feared for potentially destroying jobs, adding "we've seen this before." His tone is conversational, bordering on informative. The audio appears to be a recording of a discussion.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, engaging in a conversation. The man in the center, dressed in a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and gestures as he speaks, while the man on the left, wearing a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, listens attentively with a piece of paper in his hand. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and appears to be speaking or preparing to speak. The background displays a large screen with a blue digital image of a human head and text that reads "AI & Human Dev" along with event details: "31 May Wednesday, 10-11:30am PST, Plug and Play, 440 N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, CA 94085, US." The audience, visible in the foreground, watches the discussion attentively. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists actively participating in the dialogue.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features two speakers, one male with a measured tone and the other with a more lively, enthusiastic tone. The first speaker suggests, "I think they've reallocated jobs, they've redistributed them." He expresses skepticism about the possibility of "massive job losses," emphasizing his personal opinion: "I don't think we need to be worried." He then invites the second speaker to share his perspective, referring to him as a "Silicon Valley mover and shaker." The second speaker states, "I believe I agree with the comment," before his sentence is cut short.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion at a conference, featuring three men seated on stage. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, holds a microphone and a piece of paper, gesturing as he speaks. The man in the middle, wearing a white polo shirt and blue jeans, listens attentively, holding a microphone. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, speaks into his microphone, gesturing with his hand. Behind them, a large screen displays a digital image of a human head with a network overlay, and text that reads "AI & Human Development" along with the date and location of the event. The audience, visible in the foreground, watches the discussion. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists engaged in a dynamic conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with one male speaker, contemplating the newness of AI, stating, "I don't think this AI is as new as everybody says", then references the chatbot that's been around for 30 years and how it will improve productivity. He also speculates that it would accomplish more if you have a startup team of 10 people. This is then followed by a background sound of breathing.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion at an event titled "AI & Human Day" held on Wednesday, 11 May, from 10-11:30 am PST at Plug and Play, located at 440 N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, CA 94085, US. Three men are seated on stage, each holding a microphone, engaging in a conversation. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, gestures animatedly while speaking. The man in the center, wearing a white polo shirt and blue pants, listens attentively and occasionally responds. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, also participates in the discussion. Behind them, a large screen displays a digital image of a human head, symbolizing the event's focus on artificial intelligence and human interaction. The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members taking notes. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists actively contributing to the dialogue.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a question being asked by a male speaker about AI ethics and balancing innovation with preventing biases and discrimination. The tone is inquisitive. A second male speaker responds that human beings don't have a good record of being ethical, giving World War I and World War II as examples. A round of applause interrupts the speech. The speaker clarifies his points and states the need to sit down and discuss things as a planet to understand the repercussions. He then adds that these technologies have existed before and gives nuclear weapons as a previous example. He concludes that these questions can be tackled and stresses the need to be optimistic, but also realistic. The speaker is interrupted again, mentioning that education plays a vital role in AI literacy.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion at an event titled "AI & Human Development," held on Wednesday, 11 May, from 10-11:30am PST at Plug and Play, located at 440 N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, CA 94085, US. The setting is a conference room with an audience seated in front of the stage. On stage, two men are seated in armchairs, engaged in a conversation. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, gestures animatedly with his hands while speaking, indicating his active participation in the discussion. The man on the right, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and listens attentively, occasionally responding. Behind them, a large screen displays a digital image of a human head with a network of lines, symbolizing artificial intelligence, and the event's title. The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members taking notes or using their devices. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists and audience members contributing to a dynamic exchange of ideas.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker asking a question about integrating AI education into the Indian curriculum and what skills should be prioritized. The speaker speaks with a thoughtful tone. The clip then transitions into the response, given by a male speaker who is presumably impersonating a politician.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, each in a modern, gray armchair. The man in the center, dressed in a white t-shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and actively gestures with his hands, indicating he is speaking or explaining a point. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts sits with his legs crossed, attentively listening. On the right, another man in a light blue shirt and dark pants holds a microphone and listens intently, occasionally nodding in agreement. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up image of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members taking notes. The setting is a professional conference or seminar, characterized by a clean, modern design and a focus on the speakers. Throughout the video, the central figure continues to speak, using hand gestures to emphasize his points, while the other two panelists remain attentive and responsive. The atmosphere is one of active engagement and intellectual exchange.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features one male speaker reflecting on a cultural transition. He mentions spending a lot of his time back home in a rural environment, describing it as a "huge transition." He then reflects on having "this type of discussion" and seeing the reality of the Indian education and school system. His tone is contemplative and thoughtful.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a professional conference setting where a panel discussion is taking place. The audience, dressed in business attire, is seated in rows, attentively watching the stage. On stage, three men are seated in modern armchairs, engaged in a conversation. The man in the center, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, is actively speaking, gesturing with his hands while holding a microphone. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts listens attentively, while the man on the right, dressed in a light blue shirt and dark pants, holds a microphone and appears to be listening or waiting for his turn to speak. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up image of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The atmosphere is formal and focused, with the audience's attention directed towards the speakers. The video captures the dynamic interaction between the panelists, highlighting their engagement and the professional environment of the conference.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features one male speaker with a conversational tone. He opines that India's higher education and technical side is reasonable and competitive. However, he emphasizes the need for work in primary and secondary education, especially for poorer sections of society. He further suggests that India needs to focus on production and manufacturing skills, which have not received as much attention as they should, emphasizing their critical nature, comparable to the service sector.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, two men are seated on stage, engaged in a discussion. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, is animatedly gesturing with his hands while speaking into a microphone. He holds a piece of paper in his left hand, suggesting he may be referencing notes or questions. The man on the right, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, listens attentively, holding a microphone in his right hand and resting his left hand on his knee. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up image of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The setting appears to be a formal event or conference, with the audience likely out of frame. The atmosphere is one of focused engagement, with both participants actively involved in the conversation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker starting a question, referring to moving onto the "last question" and stating, "I want to ask one question to both of you." The conversation then transitions into a new language, with one male speaker speaking.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, each holding a microphone. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, gestures animatedly while speaking. The central figure, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, listens attentively with his hands clasped. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, speaks into his microphone, occasionally gesturing with his free hand. The backdrop displays a large image of a bearded man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members taking photos or recording the event. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists actively participating in the conversation. The setting suggests a formal event, possibly a conference or seminar, where the panelists are sharing insights or discussing a specific topic.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker asking about global artificial intelligence and India's role as a leader, while also ensuring ethical and responsible development. Then another male speaker, with a deliberate speaking style, says, "I think... you mentioned it quite frankly...technology can be very positive and if you use it the wrong way it can be very negative." The speaker provides cloning and gene technology as examples, then concludes that, "we would have enough discipline just to control the negative part of it and focus on the positive." The clip ends with the first speaker saying, "Yeah."

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, each holding a microphone. The man in the center, dressed in a white shirt and blue pants, is actively speaking and gesturing with his hands, indicating his engagement in the conversation. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts listens attentively, while the man on the right, wearing a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and appears to be listening or waiting for his turn to speak. The background displays a large screen with a close-up image of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The audience is visible in the foreground, suggesting an attentive and engaged crowd. The setting appears to be a formal event or conference, with the panelists seated in modern, comfortable chairs. The atmosphere is professional and focused, with the panelists contributing to a dynamic and interactive discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker discussing India and China's large data sets, relevant to AI systems. He emphasizes the importance of understanding and benefiting from this resource, while also cautioning against its misuse, advising careful consideration of data utilization and its implications. Intermittently, the speaker is accompanied by indistinct background sounds.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, engaging in a conversation. The man in the center, dressed in a white shirt and blue pants, is actively speaking into a microphone, using hand gestures to emphasize his points. To his left, a man in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts listens attentively, holding a piece of paper, while the man on the right, wearing a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and appears to be contributing to the discussion. The background screen displays a digital image of a human head with a network of lines, suggesting a theme related to technology or artificial intelligence. The audience, visible in the foreground, is focused on the speakers, with some members taking photos or notes. The setting is a conference room with a modern, professional atmosphere, indicated by the event details on the screen, including the title "AI & Human Dev" and the date and location of the event. The video maintains a consistent focus on the panelists and their interaction, highlighting the dynamic nature of the discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker asserting that India "has quite understood the wealth of its own data," with a concerned speaking tone that suggests this is a negative assessment. He then emphasizes that "we don't really understand it." His tone expresses worry that decisions regarding India's data will cause problems later, stressing that India must see its data as "the nation's wealth, the people's wealth," which must be handled with care and vision. The audio concludes with applause and cheering following his statement, indicating an enthusiastic audience response.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a panel discussion with three men seated on stage, each in a modern gray armchair. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, holds a microphone and gestures animatedly, indicating he is speaking or asking a question. The central figure, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and appears to be responding, with his legs crossed and hands clasped. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, listens attentively, holding a microphone in his lap. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The background is a simple, dark wall, focusing attention on the speakers. The audience, visible in the foreground, watches the panel attentively, suggesting an engaged and interested crowd. The atmosphere is professional and focused, typical of a conference or seminar setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a male speaker discussing strategic use of data, comparing it to oil. He mentions Saudi Arabia as an example, highlighting the need to process data beyond simply possessing it, specifically in relation to AI. A second male speaker interjects, stating that "data is the new oil." After this, a brief pause, followed by the first speaker continuing his talk and bringing up "Pegasus" toward the end of the clip. There is speech throughout, but minimal ambient noise.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, each in a modern armchair. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, holds a microphone and gestures animatedly, engaging with the audience or his fellow panelists. The central figure, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone and listens attentively, occasionally responding with a smile. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and appears to be speaking or preparing to speak. Behind them, a large screen displays a close-up image of a man's face, adding a visual element to the discussion. The background features a blue digital graphic, contributing to the modern and professional atmosphere of the event. The audience is visible in the foreground, indicating an attentive and engaged crowd. The video progresses with the man on the left continuing to speak and gesture, while the other two men listen and respond, creating a dynamic and interactive discussion.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with the sound of clapping, followed by a man speaking. He mentions "snooping saga" and says "Hi Modi." The man laughs. He then refers to the "Pegasus snooping saga," followed by more laughter. He makes a comment along the lines of "laughing but it's true" and then says he's "not joking." He then asks about Pegasus being on his phone, and expresses thoughts about the Pegasus snooping saga and the BJP government. A brief silence follows.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a panel discussion featuring three men seated on stage, engaging in a conversation. The man on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, gestures animatedly while speaking, indicating his active participation. The central figure, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, holds a microphone, suggesting he is either moderating or contributing to the discussion. The man on the right, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, listens attentively, occasionally adjusting his posture. Behind them, a large screen displays a digital image of a human head, symbolizing the theme of artificial intelligence and human development. The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members taking notes or recording the event. The setting is a conference room, with a professional atmosphere underscored by the presence of a large screen and the formal arrangement of the stage. The text on the screen reads "AI & Human Development," along with the date and location of the event, indicating the focus on the intersection of technology and human progress. The video maintains a consistent visual style, with the panelists' interactions and the audience's reactions providing a dynamic yet cohesive narrative.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with one male speaker discussing invasive surveillance tactics undermining democracy. He asks what measures should be taken to protect citizens' privacy. Another male speaker responds, stating that once a "new dispensation comes to power in India," they will have to regulate it carefully because right now "it's completely open season." He says anyone can do "whatever they want with...people's data." The speaker suggests they will need to study this and "create some clear rules" to protect people's information and privacy.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a panel discussion at an AI and Human Development event, with three speakers seated on stage. The speaker on the left, dressed in a green t-shirt and khaki shorts, gestures animatedly while speaking, holding a microphone. The speaker in the middle, wearing a white shirt and blue pants, listens attentively, occasionally responding with hand gestures. The third speaker, in a light blue shirt and dark pants, also holds a microphone and participates in the discussion. The background screen displays a digital image of a human head with a network overlay, and text indicating the event details: 'AI & Human Development,' '11 May Wednesday, 10-11:30am PST,' and 'Plug and Play, 440 N Wolfe Rd, Sunnyvale, CA 94085, US.' The audience, seated in rows, watches attentively, with some taking notes or recording the event. The video transitions to a close-up of the audience, showing engaged listeners, and concludes with a call to action, 'SUBSCRIBE,' displayed over an image of a large crowd, suggesting a broader audience reach.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with applause and speech, where a male speaker thanks someone named Rahul, summarizing Rahul's vision included in the recent Karnataka government manifesto. He mentions a 1,000 crore fund for entrepreneurship, particularly for people of scheduled castes and tribes, praising it as a great thing and referencing a previous discussion with Rahul about promoting innovation and entrepreneurship. The speech concludes, fading into background music, characterized by an orchestral, dramatic, and suspenseful style.
